exceptions.exn: The LHS of PSeries_eq (PSeries _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H : forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), PSeries a x = Series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) a : nat -> R x : R Unable to unify "Series ?M2477 = Series ?M2478" with "Lim_seq (sum_n (fun k : nat => PS_incr_1 a k * x ^ k)) = x * Lim_seq (sum_n (fun k : nat => a k * x ^ k))".

original: unfold PSeries. rewrite PSeries_eq. unfold Series. apply Series_ext. intros. simpl. rewrite PS_incr_1. unfold pow_n, scal. ring.
